birds.name: Robin
birds.description: A small, friendly songbird with a bright red breast, often seen in gardens.

birds.name: Cormorant
birds.description: A large black waterbird that dives to catch fish and often perches with wings spread to dry.

birds.name: House Sparrow
birds.description: A small, brown-and-grey bird commonly found in towns and gardens, often chirping in groups.

birds.name: House Sparrows
birds.description: These sociable birds often feed and nest in flocks near human homes.

birds.name: Bullfinch
birds.description: A stocky finch with a black cap and, in males, a bright pinkish-red chest.

birds.name: Grey Heron
birds.description: A tall wading bird with a long neck and legs, often seen standing still in water hunting fish

birds.name: European Jackdaw
birds.description: A small, clever member of the crow family with a grey nape and bright pale eyes.

birds.name: White Goose
birds.description: A large white waterbird with an orange beak, often seen on farms or by lakes.

birds.name: Duck
birds.description: A common waterbird with a broad bill and webbed feet, often seen paddling in ponds.

birds.name: Yellow Hammer
birds.description: A bright yellow bird that sings a cheerful "a-little-bit-of-bread-and-no-cheese" tune.

birds.name: Seagull
birds.description: A familiar coastal bird with a loud cry, often scavenging near beaches and towns.

birds.name: Egret
birds.description: A graceful white heron-like bird with black legs and yellow feet, found near water.

birds.name: Blackbird
birds.description: A glossy black songbird with a bright yellow beak and a rich, fluting song.

birds.name: Commmon Blackbird (Female)
birds.description: Unlike the male, the female is brown with a speckled breast but has the same lovely song.

birds.name: Magpie
birds.description: A black-and-white bird with iridescent blue-green feathers, known for its chattering call and love of shiny things.

birds.name: Swan
birds.description: A large, elegant white bird with a curved neck, often seen gliding gracefully on lakes.

birds.name: Common Merganser
birds.description: A striking diving duck with a long, narrow bill used for catching fish.

birds.name: Common Moorhen
birds.description: A dark waterbird with a red and yellow beak and long toes, often seen on ponds and canals.

birds.name: Homing Woodpigeon
birds.description: A plump grey bird with a white neck patch, known for its cooing and strong flight.

birds.name: White-throated Dipper
birds.description: A small, round river bird with a white chest that bobs and dives into streams.

birds.name: Black-headed Gull
birds.description: A medium-sized gull with a chocolate-brown head in summer and a sharp, laughing call.

birds.name: Little Grebe
birds.description: A tiny, shy diving bird that often vanishes underwater when disturbed.
